data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, W., Zhou S. - Y., Huang J. - H. (2005): A new species of the genus Vollenhovia Mayr and a new record species of the genus Myrmica Latreille from China (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). [In Chinese with English summary]. Acta Zootaxonomica Sinica 30: 835-838, URL: http://hdl.handle.net/10199/15445
